children.value: Manage Custom Rules in the dashboard
You can manage Custom Rules under the
This feature is only available for selected customers on an Enterprise plan.
The Custom Rules interface allows you to:
Edit, delete, or enable/disable rules in the Custom Rules card.
To enable/disable a rule, click the toggle button on the right of the rule you want to change.
on the right of the rule you want to change.
on the right of the rule you want to delete and confirm the operation.
